#include <iostream>

using std::cin;
using std::cout;
using std::endl;

int main (int argc, char* argv[])
{
    int T,N,A[50],n,i,m,cm;
    
    cin >> T;

    for(int t=0; t<T; ++t)
    {
        cin >> N;

        for (n=0; n<N; ++n) cin >> A[n];
        
        m = 50;
        for (n=0; n<N; ++n) 
        {
            cm = 0;
            for (i=0; i<N; ++i)
            {
                if (A[i] != A[n] - n + i) ++cm;
                if (cm >= m) break;
            }

            if (cm < m) m = cm;

        }
        cout << m << endl;

    }

    return 0;
}
